verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees <S%H4609><s%>. Out of the depths <S%H4615><s%> have I cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee, O YY <S%H3068><s%>.
YY <S%H136><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%> my voice <S%H6963><s%>: let thine ears <S%H241><s%> be attentive <S%H7183><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>.
If thou, YY <S%H3050><s%>, shouldest mark <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> iniquities <S%H5771><s%>, O YY <S%H136><s%>, who shall stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> ?
But there is forgiveness <S%H5547><s%> with thee, that thou mayest be feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.
I wait <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for the YY <S%H3068><s%>, my soul <S%H5315><s%> doth wait <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, and in his word <S%H1697><s%> do I hope <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

My soul <S%H5315><s%> waiteth for the YY <S%H136><s%> more than they that watch <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> for the morning <S%H1242><s%>: I say, more than they that watch <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> for the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

Let Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> hope <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8761><s%> in the YY <S%H3068><s%>: for with the YY <S%H3068><s%> there is mercy <S%H2617><s%>, and with him is plenteous <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8687><s%> redemption <S%H6304><s%>.
And he shall redeem <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> from all his iniquities <S%H5771><s%>.
